# reviewdown 

`reviewdown` builds up from the ideas provided by `rmdrive` r-package https://github.com/ekothe/rmdrive, which offers convenience functions to copy `.Rmd` files to Google Drive for synchronous collaborative editing, then return them back to a local `.Rmd` file for rendering.  

# In Development

This repository is at its first stages. Change to the `develop` branch to see current work status
